title: Vcarder
author: Vcarder
created_time: December 23, 2022, 01:03:55 AMLast edit: December 23, 2022, 01:28:39 AM by Vcarder
content: No matter how much bigger or cheaper bills you have.Its means it's not bullshit fake game.No upfront payment first work done then payment %50 is my fee real work 100%· Our Services Include:· 1: Utility Bills· 2: Mortgage Bills· 3: Credit Cards· 4: Insurance Bill· 5: Property Tax· 6: Loans BillsTerms & Conditions!- Once verified by your company, You have to pay us within 24 to 48 hours.- You have to deposit the Money in our Bitcoin - USDT Trc20 - USDC or Ethereum Wallet.We are working in almost every state and city of the USA and Canada. Our main focus is on USA customers. We are not working with one company as we are retailers of different companies, so we have a wide diversity with approximately every company.Telegram: verified_carder

comments.author: suchmoon
comments.body: Quote from: Vcarder on December 23, 2022, 12:49:10 PMWho's want this service? What exactly is your "service"? Posting incoherent illiterate garbage on the internet?Or perhaps stolen credit cards? FBI might want a piece of that.

comments.author: GxSTxV
comments.body: Quote from: suchmoon on December 23, 2022, 12:56:34 PMQuote from: Vcarder on December 23, 2022, 12:49:10 PMWho's want this service? What exactly is your "service"? Posting incoherent illiterate garbage on the internet?Or perhaps stolen credit cards? FBI might want a piece of that.I think he's using stolen cards from internet to pay people's bills since they accept any kind of cards and pretty much without any verification and he obviously can't use those stolen cards These kind of offers will only get you in trouble and i don't think anyone will be dumb enough to try that and handle this guy his bill accounts

comments.author: UmerIdrees
comments.body: Quote from: Vcarder on December 23, 2022, 01:03:55 AMNo upfront payment first work done then payment %50 is my fee real work 100%How this service will benefit the customers. You are offering to pay the bills and also taking 50% as your own fee.I don't get it how the service receiver can benefit. If you have stolen cards and you pay the bill in full and get 50% from the receivers, then this is risky because we will get caught on using a stolen compromised credit card to pay our bill. That's why you are not asking for upfront payments as you have nothing to lose Seems like a shady service to me.
